basics.name: Mehran Hatami
basics.label: Javascript Developer and Front End Engineer
basics.summary: A JavaScript enthusiast and senior front end developer with 9 years of experience, specialized in Core JavaScript development, latest HTML5 APIs and advanced JavaScript libraries, frameworks and platforms such as AngularJS, BackboneJS, jQuery, Extjs,EmberJS and also NodeJS. He started programming when he was just 13 years old, with a C++ background, passionate about dealing with mathematics algorithms.

work.summary: Other than my responsibilities as a JavaScript developer I am the technical team lead and also the scrum master.
highlights: Implemented a HTML5 API for a virtualization project called "Cloud Desktop"
Created the iOS app of the "Cloud Desktop"
Working on his first official ROR app.

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
